EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Jul14 IP Conflicts Webinar Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the webinar. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains all the WebEx and dial-in information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar: http://intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Intapp%20Open%20for%20IP%20Conflicts%20Webinar.ics
